thread.name: Invitation to Durga Puja(Oct. 16) and Bijoya Get Together(Oct. 17)

email.subject: Invitation to Durga Puja(Oct. 16) and Bijoya Get Together(Oct. 17)

text.sentence: You are cordially invited to attend State College Indian Community Durga Puja celebrations on the 16th and 17th October.
Please join in with your family and friends.
Please see attached announcement for details.
Stay tuned for exciting cultural programs.

email.to: Neela Sawant <neela.sawant@gmail.com>, Poonam Suryanarayan <poonam.suryanarayan@gmail.com>, Sujatha Das <sujatha.das@gmail.com>, Sumit Bhatia <b.sumit@hotmail.com>, Madhav - leaving for Hyd/Blore! <madhavjha@gmail.com>, Abhradeep Guha Thakurta <guhathakurta.abhradeep@gmail.com>, Saurabh Kataria <skataria@ist.psu.edu>, "Anuj \\"AJ\\" Jaiswal" <anuj.r.jaiswal@gmail.com>, Pradeep Teregowda <pbt105@cse.psu.edu>, Shalini K Pradeep <shalini.mk@gmail.com>
email.subject: Invitation to Durga Puja(Oct. 16) and Bijoya Get Together(Oct. 17)

text.sentence: Please feel free to pass this mail around. :-)
Forward to people I have missed.
Make sure to come early, so that you don't miss the Puja.

email.subject: Invitation to Durga Puja(Oct. 16) and Bijoya Get Together(Oct. 17)

text.sentence: I RSVP for two - myself and my mom, for both Durga Puja and Bijoya.
